    • Method Detail

      • getBounds

        public io.github.humbleui.types.Rect getBounds()
        Returns conservative bounding box. Uses Paint associated with each glyph to determine glyph bounds, and unions all bounds. Returned bounds may be larger than the bounds of all glyphs in runs.
        Returns:
        conservative bounding box

      • getUniqueId

        public int getUniqueId()
        Returns a non-zero value unique among all text blobs.
        Returns:
        identifier for TextBlob

      • getIntercepts

        @Nullable
public @org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable float[] getIntercepts​(float lowerBound,
                                                                 float upperBound)

        Returns the number of intervals that intersect bounds. bounds describes a pair of lines parallel to the text advance. The return array size is a multiple of two, and is at most twice the number of glyphs in the the blob.

        Runs within the blob that contain SkRSXform are ignored when computing intercepts.

        Parameters:
        lowerBound - lower line parallel to the advance
        upperBound - upper line parallel to the advance
        Returns:
        intersections; may be null

      • getIntercepts

        @Nullable
public @org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable float[] getIntercepts​(float lowerBound,
                                                                 float upperBound,
                                                                 @Nullable
                                                                 @Nullable Paint paint)

        Returns the number of intervals that intersect bounds. bounds describes a pair of lines parallel to the text advance. The return array size is a multiple of two, and is at most twice the number of glyphs in the the blob.

        Runs within the blob that contain SkRSXform are ignored when computing intercepts.

        Parameters:
        lowerBound - lower line parallel to the advance
        upperBound - upper line parallel to the advance
        paint - specifies stroking, PathEffect that affects the result; may be null
        Returns:
        intersections; may be null

      • makeFromPosH

        public static TextBlob makeFromPosH​(short[] glyphs,
                                    float[] xpos,
                                    float ypos,
                                    Font font)
        Returns a TextBlob built from a single run of text with x-positions and a single y value. Returns null if glyphs is empty.
        Parameters:
        glyphs - glyphs drawn
        xpos - array of x-positions, must contain values for all of the glyphs.
        ypos - shared y-position for each glyph, to be paired with each xpos.
        font - Font used for this run
        Returns:
        new TextBlob or null

      • makeFromPos

        public static TextBlob makeFromPos​(short[] glyphs,
                                   io.github.humbleui.types.Point[] pos,
                                   Font font)
        Returns a TextBlob built from a single run of text with positions. Returns null if glyphs is empty.
        Parameters:
        glyphs - glyphs drawn
        pos - array of positions, must contain values for all of the glyphs.
        font - Font used for this run
        Returns:
        new TextBlob or null

                                       RSXform[] xform,
                                       Font font)

        public Data serializeToData()

      • makeFromData

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable TextBlob makeFromData​(Data data)

      • getGlyphs

        @NotNull
public @org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull short[] getGlyphs()
        Returns:
        glyph indices for the whole blob

      • getPositions

        @NotNull
public @org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull float[] getPositions()

        Return result depends on how blob was constructed.

        • makeFromPosH returns 1 float per glyph (x pos)
        • makeFromPos returns 2 floats per glyph (x, y pos)
        • makeFromRSXform returns 4 floats per glyph

        Blobs constructed by TextBlobBuilderRunHandler/Shaper default handler have 2 floats per glyph.

        Returns:
        glyph positions for the blob if it was made with makeFromPos, null otherwise

      • getClusters

        @NotNull
public @org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull int[] getClusters()
        Only works on TextBlobs that come from TextBlobBuilderRunHandler/Shaper default handler.
        Returns:
        utf-16 offsets of clusters that start the glyph
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if TextBlob doesn’t have this information

      • getTightBounds

        @NotNull
public @NotNull io.github.humbleui.types.Rect getTightBounds()
        Only works on TextBlobs that come from TextBlobBuilderRunHandler/Shaper default handler.
        Returns:
        tight bounds around all the glyphs in the TextBlob
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if TextBlob doesn’t have this information

      • getBlockBounds

        @NotNull
public @NotNull io.github.humbleui.types.Rect getBlockBounds()
        Only works on TextBlobs that come from TextBlobBuilderRunHandler/Shaper default handler.
        Returns:
        tight bounds around all the glyphs in the TextBlob
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if TextBlob doesn’t have this information

      • getFirstBaseline

        @NotNull
public @NotNull java.lang.Float getFirstBaseline()
        Only works on TextBlobs that come from TextBlobBuilderRunHandler/Shaper default handler.
        Returns:
        first baseline in TextBlob
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if TextBlob doesn’t have this information
